Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>You were only forgiven because Queen
Yona is such a generous and kind soul...
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry>On a daily basis, you must conduct
yourself in an appropriate manner...
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Ugh. How much longer shall this lecture
continue?<sp:5:1:0> I long to do something else.
Anything else, really...
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>Rather than simply reaching the age of a
lady, you must prove to all that you are
one by merit of your actions...
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Ugh. How much longer shall this lecture
continue?<sp:5:1:0> Night has already fallen...
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>I advise you to begin by being more
thoughtful about how you speak to the
one who saved the domain...
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>It is just as I have been telling you ever
since we were young. It is of utmost
importance...
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Wakeup_00>Argh...<sp:5:1:0> How much longer shall this lecture
continue?<sp:5:1:0> I am...<sp:5:0:0>so very sleepy.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Ugh. How much longer shall this lecture
continue?<sp:5:1:0> It is already morning...
